projects: [{"title":"Research Project - Intervention program to increase Body image among Women","start_date":"Jun 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"Designed a 3 Day intervention program to increase Body image among Women.Was a concept leader of a team of 6 people in the design and implementation of a three-day intervention. The intervention led to increase in Body image and enhanced body positivity. Positive feedbacks were received from the participants."},{"title":"Research Project - Studying styles and their Effects on Academic Achievement and Learning ","start_date":"Oct 2017","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"A quasi experimental study was carried out on 60 students to observe and analyse whether studying for a test gives better learning behaviour i.e, different result on test scores as compared to studying in order to teach someone else."},{"title":"Psychometric Test Construction for Attachment Styles in romantic relationships","start_date":"Jun 2017","end_date":"Nov 2017","description":"Completed a psychometric test construction project with a team. The test measures four different attachment styles in romantic relationships. The four attachment styles were identified as - Secure, Anxious, Avoidant and Fearful. This test can be used in further researches in psychology and other domains, also to understand adult relationships in day to day life for growth of an individual."}]
